Cements chemical composition have to be controlled during the production to adjust the raw materials dosage and achieve the right performances. The aim this internship is to validate an x ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) to analyze the cement productions. The project will include the calibration of the XRF, the creation of a new procedure of analysis, an industrial scale test and the training of the operators. At the end of the internship, the x ray spectrometer will be used to pilot all cement productions.
